entries.title: Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0 Season 2 will finally fix its looting system
entries.description: Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0 Season 2's latest patch will address its looting and inventory management.

entries.title: Apple’s $600 M2 Mac mini obliterates the $6,000 Mac Pro
entries.description: It seems that Apple's aging $6,000 Mac Pro is all but redundant now. You might be able to replace it with a $600 Mac mini.
